name: Jim Ward
info:
• 简体中文名: 吉姆·沃德
  • 别名: James Kevin Ward
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1959-05-19
  • 身高: 1.75 m
  • 活跃时间: 1984至今
  • imdb_id: nm0911589
detail: Jim Ward was born on May 19, 1959 in New York, New York, USA as James Kevin Ward. He is an actor, known for Ratchet & Clank Future: A Crack in Time (2009), Spider-Man (2002) and Resident Evil 4 (2005). He has been married to Janice Ryan since June 27, 2009.
